study_plan_entry.title: Applications of homogeneous dynamics to Number theory

free_text.Learning outcomes: Introduction to Ergodic and dynamical system methods to be used in the context of Number theory
free_text.Content: The course will have three parts. [br/][br/]The first will give an introduction to homogeneous dynamics one arithmetic spaces (spaces of lattices) and will be based mainly on chapters 8,9,11 of Einsiedler-Ward GTM book on ergodic theory. [br/][br/]The second will survey applications of this theory  to continued fraction expansions by Einsiedler-Fishman-Shapira, Aka-Shapira and C. McMullen. [br/][br/]The third will concern the work of Ellenberg-Venkatesh on representations of quadratic forms  by quadratic forms in the codimension >4 setting .     [br/]
